Text.val: 01.03.2011 SH SCR16238 Added new admin currency logic (removed GNRL_CURRENCY)
09.06.2009 SH SCR14679 Added BTPC_MUTAEXTFIN to calc V.CLIENTBOOKINGS
08.10.2008 SH SCR14036 Removed calc of sum (BPIV_AMOUNTCURRH) to set
15.05.2007 SH SCR12539 Changed GB002.PI.DATE = date() in BTCH_CASHREPORTDATE

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT cast(SUM(BTCP_AMOUNTCURRH) as decimal(18,2)) FROM :1/btcp WHERE BTCP_BTCH_ID=:2 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
SELECT cast(SUM(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRH) as decimal(18,2)) FROM :1/bpiv WHERE BPIV_BTCH_ID=:2 and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO=:3 and BPIV_BTPC_LINENO=:4 :5 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
SELECT cast(SUM(BTPC_AMOUNTCURRH) as decimal(18,2)) FROM :1/btpc WHERE BTPC_BTCH_ID=:2 and BTPC_BTCP_LINENO=:3 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
